page.title: 16E.ALLINGTON FLORA
page.content: Devon is a lovely place for flowers. We went on a twenty minute walk up the road from school in July.We found thirty_five different varieties of wild flowers.The most common flowers were naval_wort,common catsear, fox gloves,cow parsley,pink campion.If our walk had been in May we would have seen a lot of blue_bells and primroses for which Devon is famous.Our fields in Devon are surrounded by high mounds of earth in which all of these and many others grow Among the flowers we found hogweed,bramble,wild strawberry,herb robert,pineapple may weed,fox gloves,ivy leaved road flax,tuted vetch,honey suckle,St John wort,cross wort,black briony doc,campion,lesser stitch wort,naval wort and cow parsley.
